title: Won't let me reconnect to game?

embed.description: Album . T H A N K S R I O T

body:
Client just crashed and when I tried reconnecting this message appears.
 
How do I fix this without restarting my computer?

My internet is fine.

replies.body: Your internet might be fine, but that error is notifying you that it's having problem specifically reaching the game server.  You'll want to go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  That should get you back in game!
